description:
Swap your Burley Trailer among bikes by attaching hitches to every bike in the fleet. Attaches to the rear skewer and stays attached so the trailer can be connected at any time.

  • Compatible with disc brakes and full suspension bikes
  • Does not fit breezer style dropouts
  • Mono-stays require a longer safety strap, available separately
  • Fits quick release axles and solid axles up to 12mm
  • Compatible with the Burley Bee, Honey Bee, Encore, Solo, D’Lite, Cub, Nomad, and Flatbed
  • Travoy Flex Connector is available separately
name: Burley Steel Hitch
